description: This file defines a React functional component 'BottomCard' that renders a styled floating bottom card for a user interface. It accepts children elements and an optional 'elevated' prop to control the shadow style.

methods.name: BottomCard({ children, elevated = true })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a styled bottom card container with optional elevation.
